summary: This mod sorts potions by type and then by potency, from strong to weak. Unlike many sorting mods, this grades potions descriptively (e.g. \"Exceptional\") instead of numerically. It also cuts prefixes and gives distinctive names to potions you can\'t craft.
descriptionHtml:
This mod sorts potions by type and then by potency, from strong to weak. Unlike many sorting mods, this grades potions descriptively (e.g. \"Exceptional\") instead of numerically. It also cuts prefixes and gives distinctive names to potions you can\'t craft. 

This mod can also be found on Steam Workshop at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=135141226]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=135141226[/url].

If you find any bugs or issues, please note them in the comments so I can promptly address them.
author: David Sid
